thread.title: Michael Moore Calls For Trump’s Arrest And Impeachment Over Michael Flynn Resignation
thread.title_full: Michael Moore Calls For Trump’s Arrest And Impeachment Over Michael Flynn Resignation

author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: Michael Moore Calls For Trump’s Arrest And Impeachment Over Michael Flynn Resignation
text:
Michael Moore is quite possibly the most unhinged “celebrity” that exists in America today. 
Whoopi, Lena Dunham, and Rosie might disagree, though. 
Moore was at it again following the resignation of Michael Flynn. 
Here’s the latest from the brilliant political scholar. 
From Weasel Zippers via The Daily Caller : 
Michael Moore called for President Donald Trump to be arrested and impeached following the resignation of National Security Advisor Michael Flynn. 
The 62-year-old filmmaker ranted on Twitter Monday night that Trump should resign because he reportedly knew about the phone call between Flynn and the Russian ambassador. On Monday, Trump accepted Flynn’s resignation. In his resignation, heapologized for misleading the president and Vice President Mike Pence about the call in which he allegedly discussed sanctions levied against Moscow. 
You have to have absolutely no knowledge of history to think that Trump should be impeached for what happened with Flynn. 
Moore either knows nothing about history or he’s pretending he doesn’t. 
Either way, it’s gross. 
You can bet that Moore will throw the word “impeachment” around many more times before it’s all said and done. LIKE this article? I hated this article. I'm a liberal.
